text: Bonds James Bartholomew: 'Why I won't be buying bonds until 2017' Diary of a private investor: How our diarist James Bartholomew is preparing for a bear market in bonds â€“ with one eye on the next bull market in commodities British government bonds have "extraordinarily high prices" and investors could bear the brunt of significant losses when rates rise
